title: Cap Streamers, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Brussels-style lace in a design that shows asymmetric volutes placed intervals terminating in complex floral sprays. Fond: Droschel. Modes: venises, portes, amures, fond de neige.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

mid-18th century. Medium: linen
